title: What if i told you...
body:
Morde isn't OP, its just that ADCs are underpowered by comparison and cant compete with him in lane. With the current trajectory of the game ADCs are going to fall out of meta entirely unless something is done.

Buff ADCs already

replies.body: Morde is in a good place right now.  All the juggalugs are.
I have never even seen a Morde go positive in any of my games, not since his rework anyways
Vayne and jinx so weak plz buff -_-
Nah nerf everyone else. I'd rather not be in a game where everyone can 3-hit everyone else
Totally agree. 3 hits is way too many.
